entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RyuJIT: implement AVX-512 support #77034
    8.0.0
  • Loop canonicalization should always create loop pre-headers #77033
    8.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 8) #77032
    8.0.0
  • Gradual regression of System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Char>.IterateGetPositionArray from net6.0 to net7.0-rc2 #77028
    8.0.0
  • Blazor client debugger incorrectly reading object values as null #77031
  • [Linux] System.DirectoryServices.Protocols is not supported on this platform #77022
  • System.Text.Json worked planned for .NET 8 #77020
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Source generator improvements for .NET 8.0 #77019
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json converter infrastructure improvements for .NET 8 #77018
    8.0.0
  • Json serializer code generator doesn't support internal constructors #77016
    8.0.0
  • IWA authentication on Android fails with TypeInitializationException in NetSecurityNative #77015
  • EventSource::SendManifest causes lost events which result in unmergable ETL files #77014
    8.0.0
  • TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests require 104GB free #77012
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Web Assembly (.NET 7 RC2) - Debugger crashes on VS 2022 after OIDC redirect, again #77013
  • Improving Arm64 Performance in .NET 8.0 #77010
    8.0.0
  • Only canonical types show up in profilers for generics #77007
    8.0.0
  • Got error when building mono browser os. #77006
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package is not source-build friendly #77004
  • SocketsHttpHandler is inconsistent with header value trimming on HTTP/1.1 #77001
    Future
  • Exception thrown when making a Nullable<> generic type from a System.Enum constrained generic type parameter #77000
  • File.Copy leads to deadlocks on Ubuntu Linux #76999
  • [API Proposal]: Add http request/response correlation id to LoggingHttpMessageHandler (Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Logging) #76998
  • superpmicollect access violation in pgo Bytemark #76991
    8.0.0
  • code=killed, signal=ABRT #76987
  • Valgrind support on .NET 7 #76986
  • [API Proposal]: Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #76984
  • Native AOT broken in Android-arm64 #76983
    Future
  • restore in instructions #76979
    Future
  • Equivalent to WebRequestHandler in .NET 6 #76977

Closed

  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Char> #72025
    8.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance depends on the order of constructors' definitions #46132
    8.0.0
  • Consider including AssemblyDefinition/AssemblyReference.GetAssemblyName in netstandard1.1 build #23300
    Future
  • Add cheap/fast path for MethodBase.Invoke for use in expression interpreter #6686
    Future
  • StackOverflowException on web project code analysis #76953
  • Runtime_76346 fails in jitstress on arm64 #76910
    8.0.0
  • Remove runtime dependencies on libstdc++ #76655
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Arm64]Improve the generated code for Vector128.Equals* on Arm64 #69325
    8.0.0
  • [release/3.1] CI failures: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpProtocolTests #76654
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient strange issue on .net 5.0 and .net 6.0 #76197
  • Repeated commits for mark array #75207
    8.0.0
  • Improving ARM64 Performance in .NET 7.0 #64820
    8.0.0
  • Cookies lose implicit port after having port property set to empty string. #70227
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: Better addressing mode for array access whose elements are accessed byref #67981
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'putArgRegNode->gtOper == GT_PUTARG_REG' #76879
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json have bug on .net461 #76995
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #76529
  • Mono cygwin eglib build failed direct.h not found #76993
  • Semaphore.WaitOne() does not wait on Android #76989
    7.0.x
  • CoreCLR 7.0 have changed public Debug API. Why? #76960
    7.0.x
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76346/Runtime_76346/Runtime_76346.sh #76978

PullRequests

Created

  • Trim trailing SP and HTAB for header value on HTTP/1.1 #77030
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add cecil as a dependency of the runtime #77029
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Fix Linux arm64 AOT ROOTFS_DIR missing (Less Impactful) #77027
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #77026
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Align env var lookup in clrconfig and jithost #77025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Swallow MSDTC availability exceptions for CI test reliability #77023
    area-System.Transactions
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #77021
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: minor cleanup of some inlining methods #77009
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Avoid runtime "atomic write" check in ConcurrentDictionary for shared generics #77005
    area-System.Collections
  • #76596 update icu version for norwegian culture #77003
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Use DOTNET_ variables in tests #76997
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Implement missing NAOT support (and fix garbage values passed to JIT in expandRawHandleIntrinsic) #76996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76990
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [WIP] statically linking GC PAL #76985
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Using 3 instruction sequence for x64 multiply #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Disable the hugeexpr1 test failing intermittently with issue #74555 #76950
  • retire EOL Fedora 34 #76902
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm] event pipe tweaks #76994
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76954
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76946
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix insertion of alignment after BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_ALWAYS #76988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of Equals* for Vector128 and Vector on Arm64, when LLVM is enabled #76944
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][s390x] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76920
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0][PERF][MAUI] Update Maui build Mac vmimage to macos-12 #76973
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Reintroduce typo in ICorDebug public API names #76967
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui build mac version #76945
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Include hostcommon sources in hostfxr static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Reintroduce ICorDebug typo in Mono partition as well #77002
    area-Build-mono
  • Mark the port as implicit for empty values in Cookie #76143
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [tvOS] Disable crashing test #76952
    area-System.Numerics
  • Revert "Revert "Reduce CoreCLR PAL"" #76972
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix profiler tail call insertion logic for FIELD_LIST #76883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused code from RegexGenerator #76951
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reintroduce typo in ICorDebug public API names #76966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Disable JIT/opt/OSR/pinnedlocal on all Mono flavors #76980
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Cleaner way of specifying environment variables for tests #76458
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for using sccache on Unix #76889
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Vector128.IsHardwareAccelerated guard for ToBase64CharsLargeNoLineBreaks #76970
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2020266 #76907
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Don't copy coreclr version of coreclr and SPCL to core_root when targeting mono #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Leverage the shipping, roslyn based ApiCompat in dotnet/runtime #73263
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync #75989
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add --versiononly argument to R2RDump utility #76947
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BitOperations in more places #76933
    area-Meta
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Try changing alignment #76451
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Direct PInvoke Calls with static lib seems not working for NativeAOT-LLVM WebAssembly? #1842
  • Is it possible to include the c source file in csproj instead of statically linking against a unmanaged library? #1841

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: make sure address is an i8* for memset #2035

Merged

  • remove installer leg requirement #2026
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: remove an SSA assert for TARGET_WASM #2034

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What's the status of x64 emulation effort? #28550
  • Would it be possible to pick a fix for https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/2671? #28547
  • dotnet test with multiple TargetFrameworks while specifying --output #28542
  • It was not possible to find any installed .NET Core SDKs #28539
  • Rebuild fails when project with multiple TFMs references Source Code-only Nuget package #28549

Closed

  • Unable to build sdk.sln on the v6.0.402 tag due to missing packages and package downgrades causing errors NU1103, NU1603 and NU1605 #28531
  • dotnet nuget push not working after GitHub packages changes (10/10/22) #28545
  • [.NET 7 RC2]Broken build, CS8168 and CS8350 false alarms #28535

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package #28564
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28558
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • The loc build changes didn't flow to main so going directly. #28552
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28551
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #28467
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Change the build machine to have a larger hard drive #28559
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Internal to External Port] Templating Nuget Config Changes, MSBuild #28548
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-NuGet, Priority:0, Area-dotnet new
  • Trusted roots: 2022-09 CTL #28541
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2019767 #28500
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28521
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve the example with specified language when language option is given with invalid option #28135
    Area-dotnet new
  • Trusted roots: 2022-09 CTL #28512
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28444
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28446
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28445

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref field initializer is treated as a value assignment #64725
    17.5
  • csharpsourcegenerators.findreferencesforfilewithdefinitioninsourcegeneratedfile(false) #64721
    17.5 P1
  • Syntax error parsing field initializer with `ref` expression #64720
    17.5
  • Obsolete diagnostic not reported for type named `var` brought by `using static` #64713
    Backlog
  • Extension methods from ASP.NET Core-related packages do not trigger the C# suggested usings feature in VS #64712
  • vs2022 not working with sdk 7.0.100 #64704
  • undocumented use of `NotNullWhenAttribute`/`MaybeNullWhenAttribute` on `out` parameter in method with nullable non-bool return type #64703
  • 'Go to Definition' Context-Menu option #64702
  • Add WithAdditionalDocumentText and WithAnalyzerConfigDocumentText overload that take all linked document IDs #64701
  • Not handling all combinations of named enum values and booleans should give a CS8509 warning regardless of order, even if warnings are disabled for CS8524 #64698
  • editorconfig naming rule violations do not throw warnings #64697
    17.5

Closed

  • IntelliSense doesn't work for interface statics when dotting a type parameter #64182
    17.5
  • Static virtual members of interfaces are not included into completion list on a type parameter #61255
    17.4
  • SourceGenerator: No defining declaration found for implementing declaration of partial method #64664
  • Don't infer a val escape on 'out scoped var' #64556
    17.5
  • Support `scoped` modifier for other local declarations #62039
    17.5
  • No error reported for `ref` type in a declaration expression #64259
    17.5
  • IDE0060 is reported incorrectly when parameters has nullable attributes attached #64215
  • Allow suppression and configuration of compilation level diagnostics #50035
    Backlog
  • IDE0029 and IDE0030 have the same title #63259
    Backlog
  • Roslyn ignores the minus operator from -NaN #64690

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure we include a projectId along with our ProjectChanged notification #64722
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Additional tests for ref fields #64707
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix ArgumentOutOfRangeException from using speculative semantic model #64691
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • [LSP] Write lsp logs to xunit output during tests #64689
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community

Merged

  • Inline Hints - ArgumentOutOfRangeException #64694
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64723
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64724
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Load CompletionProvider from references in background"" #64719
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cherry-pick always bind ctors #64710
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, New Feature - Required Members, OnDeckForQB
  • Fix static virtual interface members not included in type parameter completion #64716
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • VB ConvertTupleToStruct should not include NullableAttributes in it #64647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer name completion after dotted expressions which do not bind to types #64718
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64715
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix static virtual interface members not included in type parameter completion #64708
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64714
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Add EE and VS impl packages to PublishData.json #64709
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow packages to be not published #64695
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update M.CA.Testing version to 1.1.2-beta1.22512.1 #64684
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Create source texts for open buffers with the new default source hash algorithm #64668
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64706
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make titles for IDE0029 and IDE0030 unique #64685
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64693
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update references to ref fields spec #64686
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix crash in MetadataAsSource when opening loose (misc) files #64683
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64727
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE
  • Update VS Platform NuGet package version #64667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Track local constant usage in attributes #64660
    Area-Compilers
  • Suppress IOperation validation for lambda parameter initializers #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputBase should clear validation message store on Dispose for dynamic forms #44531
  • ASP.NET HTTPS request "hangs" when reading request stream on certain requests #44525
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rtm.22510.17] Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Converting circular structure to JSON when opening a new tab #44521
  • blazor server signalr JsonReaderException #44520
  • 'dotnet publish' does not publish wwwroot when Blazor project is a dependency #44519
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44517

Closed

  • Add RenderFragment-like functionality to pure partials and view components in pure Razor SST #40299
    Backlog
  • Easily passing RenderFragment children to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ComponentTagHelper #31772
    Backlog
  • The `IJSObjectReference.Invoke` implementation does not support Javascript properties (i.e. getters and setters) #25756
    Backlog
  • .NET5 RC1: WebAssemblyPrerendered with authentication enabled #26270
    Backlog
  • Blazor + TailwindCss template #37644
    Backlog
  • Support for extraQueryParameters in Blazor WASM / MSAL #25391
    Backlog
  • Components: Add Compiler generated strongly-typed methods for URL generation #6352
    Backlog
  • Please release new version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Abstraction #44457
  • Razor Class Library Different Output when using GeneratePackageOnBuild vs dotnet pack #44382
  • PageModel IUrlHelper DI for integration tests? #44518
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc #44454
  • Perf regression: json_netty #44478
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44482
  • Web API project with RateLimiting middleware - Unhandled exception. System.NotImplementedException: The method or operation is not implemented #44494
  • Performance issue with PersistentComponentState #44271

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip template update check in template tests #44532
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Fix components-e2e pipeline #44530
    6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523

Merged

  • Write manual Parallel.For to await test result #44528
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Stabilize versions #44485
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Add comment about mixing FallbackPolicy with AuthorizeFilter #44506
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.0
  • Fixing XML documentation #44511
    8.0-preview1
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Add code cleanup rules (+perf) #44269
    8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix logging of certificate chain errors. #44503
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2019976 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    Docs, area-security
  • Add comment about mixing FallbackPolicy with AuthorizeFilter #44505
    area-web-frameworks
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adds dialog form method to FormMethod enum #44500
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [dsrouter] Implement a WebSocket server #3422
    7.0.0
  • createdump fails with "[createdump] ERROR: ReadMemory(0x562aef77e040, 38) phdr FAILED" #3445
  • Add dumprequests command to sos #536
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [DRAFT] add server-websocket mode to dotnet-dsrouter #3461

Updated

  • Add service manager and reflection based service discovery #3448

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML Hot Reload fails with TypeConverter for RowDefinitionCollection error #10679
  • Preferences.Get() gives different results on Windows Machine simulator vs Android simulator ... #10676
  • MAUI App Windows App - Mouse movement reversed #10675
  • Maui iOS failing to load local resources in using WebView Source #10674
  • IconImageSource not using FontFamily for correct image #10673
  • Maui jumps with the shell, and the Android input soft keyboard does not automatically close #10671
  • MessagingCenter is not thread safe #10670
  • .NET MAUI Icon and Splash screen Looks Bad #10669
  • Basic Frame Test no longer passes on WinUI #10668
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Localize Workload descriptions #10667
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • System.UnathorizedException: denied access to resizer/r/drawable elements #10666
  • When using a barcode scanner, the Entry.Completed event is fired with empty Text #10663
    Backlog
  • WindowSoftInputModeAdjust.Resize and Pan on iOS #10662
    Backlog
  • [Bug] [Android] Inconsistent toolbar text color on interaction. #10660
    Backlog
  • [Bug] [MacCatalyst] [iOS] Content page ToolBarItem icon image not displaying properly #10659
    Backlog

Closed

  • Add IsTrimmable=False attribute to non-trimmable assemblies #9816
    7.0
  • [WinUI] Flashy backgrounds on start #10629
  • Hover gesture recognizer #9141
    7.0
  • [MacCatalyst] PointerOver visual state freezes up #10227
    Backlog
  • Attached Property Errors #10652
  • Entry Control: When IsPassword is enabled and FontSize isn't specified , the text font doesn't affect placeholder font #10620
  • [Android] Stacklayout child get cropped inside scroll view #10658
    Backlog
  • Lottie animation not visible on Page from ServiceProvider #10628
  • Android PopModalAsync still fails when popping a NavigationPage after latest review update (.NET 7) #10656
  • Shell navigation PopToRoot does not work on Windows if stack size > 2 #10524
    Backlog
  • [Android] ConfigureLifecycleEvents OnBackPressed sample from documentation does not compile #10555
  • Frame.Opacity has no Effect #10220
    Backlog
  • [Android] OnNavigatedTo is called with PreviousPage when application is waked up from background #10485
  • [Android] Images aren't reloading correctly in CollectionView #10435

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix WinAppSDK 12 Additional resources keys #10680
  • Update to WinAppSDK 1.2 #10678
  • [iOS] Set data context on MauiDoneAccessoryView. #10677
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Frame opacity #10672
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix PGR issue on Catalyst #10665
    platform/macOS 🍏

    area/gestures
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22511.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22513.1 #10661

Updated

    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling (Shadows) #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃

    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON Columns produce NULL value for empty collections #29348
  • Can't translated `set.GroupBy(x=>x.Time.Year)` #29345
  • `Select(x=>new { a=Sum(NullableField)??null })` generate `COALESCE` error #29344
  • Is there any plan to support migrations for the same DbContext on the same assembly on multiple providers? #29343
  • How to delete the child rows via foreign key without loading navigation property? #29341
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor throwing NullReferenceException on one server in cluster #29340

Closed

  • JSON_VALUE query not able to use indexes #29342
  • How could I set the name of a shadow property for a foreign key? #29322
  • Referencing EntityFrameworkCore.Design in .NET MAUI Application results in build error #29335
  • SQLite cannot apply aggregate operator 'Sum' on expressions of type 'decimal'. #29314
  • Cannot add navigation property to owned types if it holds the foreign key #29234
  • EFCore cannot get new value in docker, if use rsync replace sqlite file #29302

PullRequests

Created

  • ToString() on string columns added #29349
  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Stabilize versions #29328
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Use type mapping from IDbFunction while translating (#27995) #29216
    blocked, Servicing-approved, 6.0.12
